title: Tribal land subject to permission granted under M
clause_text: Tribal land subject to permission granted under M.L.R. code, Government lands allotted to project proponent subject to Regulation No.14.1.1.13(ii).

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
